faqs.answer: Razorpay provides a full-stack financial suite. We help you accept payments via 100+ modes, manage subscriptions, automate payroll, and even bank via RazorpayX.
We do not charge any monthly subscription or setup fees. You only pay a small transaction fee (standard 2%) when you actually receive a payment.
Razorpay is built for everyoneâ€”from freelancers and early-stage startups to large enterprises. If you need to accept money online, we are for you.
For our standard Payment Gateway, we charge 2% per transaction for Indian cards, UPI, and wallets. For international cards, the fee is 3%.
Our Payment Gateway allows you to accept payments on your website or app via UPI, Credit/Debit cards, and Netbanking securely.
RazorpayX Payroll is our automated payroll software. It handles salary disbursals, compliance payments (TDS, PF, PT), and filings automatically.
Integration is super fast! We have plugins for WooCommerce, Shopify, and Magento, plus SDKs for Android, iOS, and Web. You can go live in minutes.
Standard settlement cycle is T+2 days, meaning money hits your bank account 2 working days after the transaction.
You can reach our support team via the dashboard or email support@razorpay.com. We are available 24/7.
